item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Crayon Shin-chan Fierceness That Invites Storm! Me and the Space Princess (2012) [DVD9]
item.description:
Crayon Shin-chan Fierceness That Invites Storm! Me and the Space Princess​
  • Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi wo Yobu! Ora to Uchu no Princess
  • File: ISO (DVD9)
  • Duration: 117 minutes
  • Original Release Year: 2012
  • Encoding: MPEG-2
  • Aspect Ratio(s): 16:9 Vista
  • Subtitles: Japanese
  • Audio Track: Japanese Dolby Digital 5.1ch & Japanese Dolby Digital Surround

- DVD release of "Crayon Shin-Chan" 20th theatrical anime based on the popular manga written by Yoshito Usui. Plot: Suddenly Nohara family is kidnapped by two aliens and arrives on Himawari planet. The king declares Shin-chan's sister has to become their princess or Himawari will destroy earth! But becoming a princess means to be apart of family! Includes manual (8 pages).
- Special Feature / Bonus Track: creditless opening (Clay animation), creditless ending, teaser, trailer, setting guide.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
